channel.title: Liquid Launch on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Liquid Launch on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Liquid Glass Could Be One of Apple's Most Divisive System Designs Yet
item.description: As Apple’s radical redesign rolls out across all of its platforms today, designers and app creators are still unconvinced it delivers the “greater focus” it promises.
